entry.title: Friday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow mixed with rain beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
